channel.title: Comments on: The Lazy DBA Series: High Availability
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jason Morris
item.dc:creator: Jason Morris
item.content:encoded:
Your server that contains the mirrored databases does not need a license if…
1. It only has mirrored databases on it – e.g. none that can be accessed directly.
2. If you fail over to it you may use it for a maximum of 30 days before you require a license.

Hope that helps.

item.title: By: Nadiya
item.dc:creator: Nadiya
item.content:encoded:
hi great article and yes licensing is a question – have got a lot of confusing info from Microsoft and sales reps

i am to build failover clustering supplemented by db mirroring (sql 2008 r2 standard edition) or log shipping
do i need a license for the mirror/log shipping server or not?
